name: Sofitel Berlin Gendarmenmarkt

reviews.title: Muito Bom
reviews.text: The localisation is very good. The breakfast had plenty of food and it was very good. The rooms were quiet and very good. If I had someone going to Berlin I will definetly recommend the hotel. Keep the goog work!

reviews.title: Excellent hotel
reviews.text: Very comfortable bed and great power shower, helped to set me up for the day ahead. I know Berlin well and have stayed there several times. As my time in the city was very limited on this occasion I chose this hotel as the location is very central within easy reach of bus to Berlin Tegel Airport. I found the staff welcoming and helpful.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We really have to thank this beautiful hotel (and its staff), perfectly located in the most beautiful Berlin´s square. Excellent service, comfort, cleanliness and the beautiful view from our room, have contributed to make our three days in Berlin were even better.
reviews.title: Thanks for making our days in Berlin even better
Great area, really nice hotel
reviews.text: Stayed here for 5 nites - Really nice room with a large comfy bed.
Staff very pleasant/helpful. Didn't try the restaurant but it was always very busy.
reviews.title: Great Food!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The good far outweigh the bad that's for sure. Fantastic staff, from the front desk to the super nice bartender to the housekeepers. We had many questions for the concierge and they were always very helpful with restaurant suggestions and directions. They even printed a map of the area to help us find a particular restaurnt. We didn't eat at the restaurant, but it was packed every single night. The rooms are decorated quite nicely and are very clean, and the bed was super comfortable. It was nice having turn down service as well.
reviews.title: Great hotel, with some quirks

reviews.text: One quirk was the air conditioning. We couldn't seem to get it to cool off at all, and had to open the windows to get fresh, cool air (we prefer to sleep in cool hotel rooms). We just attributed it to being different than in the States. A couple of days went by and I mentioned it to the front desk, whereupon they said they hadn't switched the air conditioning for the building to "summer" mode, which is why we couldn't get cool air. Luckily our room faced the courtyard, so it was relatively quiet, and we could open the windows with no sound issues. If it faced the street, the noise with the windows open would definitely had been an issue.
reviews.title: Only OK

reviews.text: The door to the toilet doubled as the door to the bathroom when you opened it all the way, which was fine, but it was a frosted glass door. I HATE that! I've seen that so much in Europe and I really dislike feeling like the people in the room can see me do my "stuff".
reviews.title: Exceptionally nice hotel for business

reviews.text: Outside of that, I highly recommend the Sofitel. The location is fabulous!! Especially for tourists like us.
reviews.title: Fabulous hotel during ITB, glad to be back again!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This Sofitel hotel provided the best lodging experience my wife and I have had to date. From our stylish room and amazing view of the square outside to the tasty food and exceptional service, it was a first class stay on every level. I was most impressed by the little things such as the staff calling me by my first name as I entered and exited the hotel, as well as the concierge's persistence in helping us get great seats at the Deutsche Oper Berlin on short notice. Kudos to the staff!
reviews.title: Exceptional ambiance and service!

reviews.text: Friendly service from every single staff member, top location, value for money.
reviews.title: 5 Star quality +

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Best hotel we stayed in while in Europe
reviews.title: Very well located but disapointing hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What can you say other than very sophisticated slick hotel in a truly great location.
reviews.title: Beautiful Hotel, Slick Design ,Quality Rooms - FANTASTIC LOCATION!!

reviews.text: The rooms were slick and fantastically appointed in every way.
reviews.title: We'll be back for more

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There really is a well heeled clientele that frequents this hotel and the only negative is the looks up and down from other guests who think they are just so much better than the rest, but thats to be expected in this type of hotel, we were just in for a few good days and were out to impress no-one.
reviews.title: Amazing hotel facing a beautiful square

description: The Sofitel Berlin Gendarmenmarkt welcomes you in the heart of the capital. Located close to the Reichstag and the Brandenburg Gate, only 10 km from the exhibition centre and the airports, our prestigious hotel featuring 92 rooms and 4 conference rooms is the premier address for leisure and business stays. French elegance and historical charm characterise our spa area as well. Another highlight is our breakfast, considered the best in the city by the media.
